entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Tobermory
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:32 p.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and overnight. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 before morning. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and early afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
